subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish  won his second straight tournament and 10th straight match, beating John Isner, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (7-4), in the final of the Atlanta Tennis Championships.
snippet: Mardy Fish  won his second straight tournament and 10th straight match, beating John Isner, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (7-4), in the final of the Atlanta Tennis Championships.
